Student Health Services

Student Health Services

Published: 3/19/2020 10:26 AM

Page Description Content

Healthy Students Are Better Learners

The mission of the School Health Services team is to support districts as they support students with their health needs.  We know that there is a critical link between health and learning and the role of schools to help improve the well-being of students.

Research shows that when school districts and schools have effective policies and practices that support the health of their students and staff there are positive results:

  • Student concentration improves

  • Student behavior problems are reduced

  • Student and staff attendance increases

  • Children and adolescents develop life-long health-promoting behaviors

Main Content

More information about why student health must be addressed is available at the Attendance Works website. 

**Regional School Health Trainings CANCELLED**

Our spring regional trainings have been cancelled due the Covid-19 pandemic. We apologize for any inconvenience.

. 

​Accessibility

We strive to ensure the pages of this website are accessible to individuals with disabilities. Every effort has been made to ensure the pages of this website are accessible to individuals with disabilities in accordance with Section 508 of the Rehabilitation Act. 

Note: Some of the links on this site access non-governmental agencies.  The information on these pages is not controlled by KDE or the Commonwealth of Kentucky.
